entry.string: Note: Creating a representative will place the selected user into your defined reprentatives group. If you have not have defined such a group please do so now before create a representative.
entry.translation: Notera: Att skapa en representant kommer placera den valda användaren i din definierade representantgrupp. Om du inte har definierat en sådan grupp, vänligen gör det nu innan du skapar en representant.
